-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))↔((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)))
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

comment: The projection subspace of the difference between two projectors. Part 2 of Theorem 1 of [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
